items.title: Save 58% on Yeedi’s S14 Plus or M12 Ultra Plus robot vacs + mops at returning and new lows from $340 (Reg. $800+)
items.summary:
Through the official Yeedi Amazon storefront, you can pick up the advanced S14 Plus Robot Vacuum and Mop for $499.99 shipped, which has been keeping my floors clear and clean all through 2025 and into the new year, which you can learn more about in my hands-on review here. Down from its full $1,200 price tag, we saw discounts over the last year since its March 2025 release go as low as $520 during Black Friday/Cyber Monday and Christmas sales. Now, you can bring home the same advanced system that has served me well with an even lower price, thanks to the $700 markdown, landing it at a new all-time low price. You can also save a bit more while still getting some advanced autonomous cleaning (not as advanced as the S14 Plus) by going with the M12 Ultra Plus robot that is down at its $339.99 low. Head below to learn more about these models.

items.title: Anker’s new SOLIX E10 smart hybrid whole-home backup system launches: Save up to $3,000 with a $10 down payment
items.summary:
As we’ve seen from brands like Tesla and EcoFlow, Anker SOLIX is getting into the whole-home backup arena with the launch of its new E10 Smart Hybrid Whole-Home Backup System for pre-order, with a $10 down payment unlocking up to $3,000+ in benefits, including a $500 off coupon voucher for when the system officially opens for purchase next month. There are four main packages that will range from a starting $4,299 rate up to $15,698, and securing a pre-order now gives you a $500 off coupon, a 400W solar panel, a 5-to-8-year extended warranty, and various other savings/accessories. Head below to learn more about this new system and to get a breakdown of the four different setup packages ahead of them opening for purchase next month.

items.title: Save up to $694 on Lectric e-bikes as you upgrade your 2026 commute during its New Year Sale – deals start from $999
items.summary:
With its long-term extended holiday sale having officially come to an end, Lectric has now launched its New Year Sale with up to $694 savings across its lineup. Of course, the biggest deals during this new event are on Lectric’s XPedition 2 Cargo e-bikes, with the standard 13Ah e-bike getting a $346 bundle at $1,399 shipped, while the 26Ah dual-battery e-bike is getting a $545 bundle at $1,799 shipped, and the 35Ah dual-battery long-range e-bike is seeing the $694 bundle at $1,999 shipped. Without the usual savings on the bundles themselves, as is common during Lectric’s sale events, you’d have to pay either $1,745, $2,344, or $2,693 for these same packages at full price. They may not be the largest bundles like we saw during Black Friday and the previous holiday sale events, but you’re still saving a significant amount – up to $693 – while also upgrading to one of America’s most popular cargo-hauling solutions. Head below to check out the full sale’s lineup of deals.

more…

Elon Musk says Apple and Google's Gemini deal “seems like an unreasonable concentration of power for Google given that [they] also have Android and Chrome”  —  Elon Musk today expressed concern about Apple and Google partnering on a more personalized version of Siri powered by Google's generative AI platform Gemini.
